## About This Portfolio

This is your semester-long research journal. Each week, you'll add your findings here, then share relevant parts to the weekly Slack battlefield channel.

**How to use:**
1. Add a new week section after each class
2. Do your research and fill in the template
3. Share your best findings to the Slack channel
4. Watch your portfolio grow into your final project foundation
